def decrypt_repeating_cipher(n, t):
    i = 1
    ans = ''
    count = 1
    while i < n:
        ans += t[i]
        i = i + count
        count += 1
    return ans

def decrypt_repeating_cipher(n, t):
    i = -1
    ans = ''
    count = 1
    while i < n:
        ans += t[i]
        i = i + count
        count += 1
    return ans
